title: The Service Center
prompt: A overhead or wide-angle view of a modest single-story rural clinic building nestled among trees and open fields at golden hour, its simple architecture and modest footprint emphasized against the expansive landscape; warm late-afternoon light casting long shadows across the gravel parking area where a few vehicles sit, with split-rail fencing and wildflowers visible in the foreground, conveying quiet efficiency and sustainable scale rather than institutional grandeurâ€”shot in documentary style with deep earth tones, muted color palette, and a sense of dignified purpose fit to its community's actual needs.
